= Downloads =

 SDL 2.0:
  * [https://sdl-gpu.googlecode.com/svn/builds/SDL2_gpu-0.8.0-msvc.zip SDL2_gpu 0.8.0, Windows - Visual Studio]
  * [https://sdl-gpu.googlecode.com/svn/builds/SDL2_gpu-0.8.0-mingw32.zip SDL2_gpu 0.8.0, Windows - MinGW32]
 SDL 1.2:
  * [https://sdl-gpu.googlecode.com/svn/builds/SDL_gpu-0.8.0-mingw32.zip SDL_gpu 0.8.0, Windows - MinGW32]

For other builds, check the [https://code.google.com/p/sdl-gpu/source/browse/#svn%2Fbuilds 'builds' directory] in the repository.
